As Orchestra spoke to Blacknightmare, blacknightmares head and body 
trembled in pain as fear also filled her entire being as a voice 
filled her head.

????: "You are not going anywhere. You made an agreement, it is time 
for you to return. You can not resist me... you are my puppet, my 
puppet for me to do with you as I wish."

As the voice said this Blacknightmare found herself drawing her blast 
and aiming at Orchestra, at the saem time her optics began to glow a 
bright blue as he body was surrounded in a red glow. The mysterious 
voice speaking to orchestra now through Blacknightmares mouth, its 
voice replacing her.

????: "She is not going anywhere with you. She is my puppet, follow 
and you shall find oblivion."

With those words the voice dissapeared yet the red glow remained 
aroudn her body as she was forced to fire at Orchestra at close range 
before being amde to run off. Meanwhile back in the undersea base, a 
potion of the ocean floor opens a bright glow emanating from the 
chamber. Inside the control room the mysterious bot laughs evily as 
it looks to Blight.

????: "How long until launch?"

Blight: "Five seconds..."

The mysterious bot turns and looks to a clock with the cybertronian 
symbols for four slowly coming, then 3, then 2, then 1. As one is 
reached a large projectile is launched from the ocean floor, in a few 
moments the massive glowing object breaks the surface of the ocean, 
still flying up. The glowing shell around it soon breaks away 
revealing a black opject looking like a type of obelisk which soon 
pierces through the atmosphere, that soon breaking away leaving a 
large grey and red object made of energy now in orbit right over the 
Mid atlantic base somehow being able to stay over it. Three blue dish 
like objects then appear on its face. Its purpose yet unknown to all 
but the infecticons and of course some people in the RPG.
